name: ARCHamster JoJonson's Bizzare Adventure: Unstable Crusade
name_original: ARCHamster JoJonson's Bizzare Adventure: Unstable Crusade
description:
Travel through space.

But your ship is trying to break. And so does your sanity.

And you are a hamster in a ball.

Sounds and visuals licensing info: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1-L1lrzt-Q4rbihaEj0mTzin45jdUJLl-g6OYxbuVa6Y/edit
